title: Behind the Scenes Minis: The White House
itunes:title: Behind the Scenes Minis: The White House
description:
Holly and Tracy talk about how this week's topic shifted from its original plan. They also discuss how slavery in the U.S. capital has been handled in media.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
